item.title: Youâ€™re Not Throwing Out That Cell Phone, Are You?
item.description: Seriously, don’t even think about throwing away that old cell phone, especially with the economy the way it is. It might not make calls anymore, but it’s still worth money. You wouldn’t throw cash in the trash, would you? People trash millions of dollars worth of old electronics every year because they don’t realize their value. Selling it yourself seems like a hassle, but it can be easy! Some phones, especially smartphones, are worth a significant amount of money.
